response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,200,000 based on your needs and requirements. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price tailored to reflect its true worth. My proposed offer for this remarkable product is $950,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows for a substantial return for us while providing you with a significant savings compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
